subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Edmonton Oilers signed Taylor Hall, an 18-year-old forward who was the top overall pick in the N.H.L. draft, to a three-year contract.
snippet: The Edmonton Oilers signed Taylor Hall, an 18-year-old forward who was the top overall pick in the N.H.L. draft, to a three-year contract.
